ayahs.text: [{"word_arabic":"رَبِّ","word_ayah":7,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":63898,"word_number_in_surah":30,"word_translation":"Lord","word_transliteration":"rabbi"},{"word_arabic":"السَّمَاوَاتِ","word_ayah":7,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":63899,"word_number_in_surah":31,"word_translation":"(of) the heavens","word_transliteration":"al-samawati"},{"word_arabic":"وَالْأَرْضِ","word_ayah":7,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":63900,"word_number_in_surah":32,"word_translation":"and the earth","word_transliteration":"wal-ardi"},{"word_arabic":"وَمَا","word_ayah":7,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":63901,"word_number_in_surah":33,"word_translation":"and whatever","word_transliteration":"wama"},{"word_arabic":"بَيْنَهُمَا","word_ayah":7,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":63902,"word_number_in_surah":34,"word_translation":"(is) between both of them","word_transliteration":"baynahuma"},{"word_arabic":"إِن","word_ayah":7,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":63903,"word_number_in_surah":35,"word_translation":"if","word_transliteration":"in"},{"word_arabic":"كُنتُم","word_ayah":7,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":63904,"word_number_in_surah":36,"word_translation":"you","word_transliteration":"kuntum"},{"word_arabic":"مُّوقِنِينَ","word_ayah":7,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":63905,"word_number_in_surah":37,"word_translation":"would be certain","word_transliteration":"muqinina"}]

[{"word_arabic":"وَإِنِّي","word_ayah":20,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":63989,"word_number_in_surah":121,"word_translation":"And indeed I","word_transliteration":"wa-inni"},{"word_arabic":"عُذْتُ","word_ayah":20,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":63990,"word_number_in_surah":122,"word_translation":"[I] seek refuge","word_transliteration":"udh'tu"},{"word_arabic":"بِرَبِّي","word_ayah":20,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":63991,"word_number_in_surah":123,"word_translation":"with my Lord","word_transliteration":"birabbi"},{"word_arabic":"وَرَبِّكُمْ","word_ayah":20,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":63992,"word_number_in_surah":124,"word_translation":"and your Lord","word_transliteration":"warabbikum"},{"word_arabic":"أَن","word_ayah":20,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":63993,"word_number_in_surah":125,"word_translation":"lest","word_transliteration":"an"},{"word_arabic":"تَرْجُمُونِ","word_ayah":20,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":63994,"word_number_in_surah":126,"word_translation":"you stone me","word_transliteration":"tarjumuni"}]

[{"word_arabic":"إِنَّ","word_ayah":40,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":64111,"word_number_in_surah":243,"word_translation":"Indeed","word_transliteration":"inna"},{"word_arabic":"يَوْمَ","word_ayah":40,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":64112,"word_number_in_surah":244,"word_translation":"(the) Day of Judgment","word_transliteration":"yawma"},{"word_arabic":"الْفَصْلِ","word_ayah":40,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":64113,"word_number_in_surah":245,"word_translation":"(the) Day of Judgment","word_transliteration":"al-fasli"},{"word_arabic":"مِيقَاتُهُمْ","word_ayah":40,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":64114,"word_number_in_surah":246,"word_translation":"(is) an appointed term for them","word_transliteration":"miqatuhum"},{"word_arabic":"أَجْمَعِينَ","word_ayah":40,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":64115,"word_number_in_surah":247,"word_translation":"all","word_transliteration":"ajma'ina"}]

[{"word_arabic":"كَذَلِكَ","word_ayah":54,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":64181,"word_number_in_surah":313,"word_translation":"Thus","word_transliteration":"kadhalika"},{"word_arabic":"وَزَوَّجْنَاهُم","word_ayah":54,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":64182,"word_number_in_surah":314,"word_translation":"And We will marry them","word_transliteration":"wazawwajnahum"},{"word_arabic":"بِحُورٍ","word_ayah":54,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":64183,"word_number_in_surah":315,"word_translation":"(to) companions with beautiful eyes","word_transliteration":"bihurin"},{"word_arabic":"عِينٍ","word_ayah":54,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":64184,"word_number_in_surah":316,"word_translation":"(to) companions with beautiful eyes","word_transliteration":"inin"}]

[{"word_arabic":"لَا","word_ayah":56,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":64190,"word_number_in_surah":322,"word_translation":"Not","word_transliteration":"la"},{"word_arabic":"يَذُوقُونَ","word_ayah":56,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":64191,"word_number_in_surah":323,"word_translation":"they will taste","word_transliteration":"yadhuquna"},{"word_arabic":"فِيهَا","word_ayah":56,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":64192,"word_number_in_surah":324,"word_translation":"therein","word_transliteration":"fiha"},{"word_arabic":"الْمَوْتَ","word_ayah":56,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":64193,"word_number_in_surah":325,"word_translation":"the death","word_transliteration":"al-mawta"},{"word_arabic":"إِلَّا","word_ayah":56,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":64194,"word_number_in_surah":326,"word_translation":"except","word_transliteration":"illa"},{"word_arabic":"الْمَوْتَةَ","word_ayah":56,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":64195,"word_number_in_surah":327,"word_translation":"the death","word_transliteration":"al-mawtata"},{"word_arabic":"الْأُولَى","word_ayah":56,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":64196,"word_number_in_surah":328,"word_translation":"the first","word_transliteration":"al-ula"},{"word_arabic":"وَوَقَاهُمْ","word_ayah":56,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":64197,"word_number_in_surah":329,"word_translation":"And He will protect them","word_transliteration":"wawaqahum"},{"word_arabic":"عَذَابَ","word_ayah":56,"word_number_in_ayah":9,"word_number_in_quran":64198,"word_number_in_surah":330,"word_translation":"(from the) punishment","word_transliteration":"adhaba"},{"word_arabic":"الْجَحِيمِ","word_ayah":56,"word_number_in_ayah":10,"word_number_in_quran":64199,"word_number_in_surah":331,"word_translation":"(of) the Hellfire","word_transliteration":"al-jahimi"}]

[{"word_arabic":"فَإِنَّمَا","word_ayah":58,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":64207,"word_number_in_surah":339,"word_translation":"Indeed","word_transliteration":"fa-innama"},{"word_arabic":"يَسَّرْنَاهُ","word_ayah":58,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":64208,"word_number_in_surah":340,"word_translation":"We have made it easy","word_transliteration":"yassarnahu"},{"word_arabic":"بِلِسَانِكَ","word_ayah":58,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":64209,"word_number_in_surah":341,"word_translation":"in your tongue","word_transliteration":"bilisanika"},{"word_arabic":"لَعَلَّهُمْ","word_ayah":58,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":64210,"word_number_in_surah":342,"word_translation":"so that they may","word_transliteration":"la'allahum"},{"word_arabic":"يَتَذَكَّرُونَ","word_ayah":58,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":64211,"word_number_in_surah":343,"word_translation":"take heed","word_transliteration":"yatadhakkaruna"}]
